src:
Jamu Manchester City, Liverpool Diminta Tak Ulang Kesalahan Musim Lalu
04 Nov 2019, 18:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Eks gelandang Liverpool Jamie Redknapp menegaskan The Reds harus bisa menang atas Manchester City pada pekan ke-12 Premier League nanti agar tak mengulang kesalahannya musim 2018-19 lalu.
Musim lalu, dari dua pertemuan dengan Manchester City di pentas liga, Liverpool tak pernah bisa menang. The Reds kalah sekali dan imbang sekali.
Musim lalu di liga Liverpool cuma kalah sekali dari 38 laga dan kekalahan itu mereka dapatkan saat bertandang ke Etihad Stadium. Dan saat bermain di Anfield, The Reds hanya bisa bermain imbang 0-0 lawan pasukan Josep Guardiola itu.
Pada akhirnya hasil laga itu cukup berpengaruh pada perburuan gelar juara liga. Sebab Man City akhirnya bisa jadi juara liga dengan keunggulan satu angka saja dari Liverpool.
text:
Entertaining Manchester City, Liverpool were asked not to repeat last season's mistakes
Nov 04 2019, 18:25 by Bola.net
Former Liverpool midfielder Jamie Redknapp insists the Reds must be able to win over Manchester City in the 12th week of the Premier League so as not to repeat the mistakes of the 2018-19 season.
Last season, from two meetings with Manchester City on the league stage, Liverpool have never been able to win. The Reds lost once and drew once.
Last season in the Liverpool league they only lost once in 38 matches and they lost it when they traveled to the Etihad Stadium. And while playing at Anfield, the Reds could only draw 0-0 against Josep Guardiola's men.
In the end the result of the game was quite influential in the hunt for league titles. Because Man City could finally become league champions with just one point ahead of Liverpool.
